text: Maurice Roëves (; 19 March 1937 – 14 July 2020) was a Scottish actor. He was born in Sunderland, England. His best known movie roles were in Ulysses, Oh! What a Lovely War, The Last of the Mohicans and Judge Dredd. His best known television roles were on EastEnders (2003), A Touch of Frost (2003) and Skins (2008). Roëves died on 14 July 2020, aged 83.Maurice Roëves dead: Doctor Who actor passes away aged 83 ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1937 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Scottish movie actors Category:Scottish television actors Category:Scottish voice actors Category:Scottish stage actors Category:People from Sunderland
title: Maurice Roëves
